title: All The Queens' Men
overview: Behind every great Drag Queen, there stands a handsome husband. Join Latrice Royale's better half, Christopher, as he hosts this weekly series of what it's like to be a husband to a Queen from RuPaul's Drag Race. Featuring two new guest husbands each week, this series will share stories from the romantic royal relationships while learning what it is like to be the King to such a fabulous Queen.
